src_original: 04136 sarvatra vādino dharmo yaḥ sva-sādhyatayā īpsitaḥ
04136 tad dharmavati bādhā syān na anya-dharmeṇa dharmiṇi  04137 anyathā asya uparodhaḥ ko bādhite anyatra dharmiṇi
04141 yathā parair anutpādyā pūrva-rūpan na kha-ādikam
04142 tadvad vastu-svabhāvo asan dharmī vyoma-ādir ity api
